title: poorNam bOdhO-ham
sahitya:
pUrNam bOdhO-aham sadAnanda pUrNam bOdhO-aham
anupallavi

varNAshramAcAra karmAdidUrO-aham svarNa vadakhila vikAragatO-aham
caraNam 1

pratyagAtmA-aham pravitata satya ghanO-aham shrutyanta shatakOTi 
prakaTitabrahmA-aham nityO-aham bhayO-aham dvitIyO-aham
   
caraNam 2

sAkSi mAtrO-aham pragalita pakSapAtO-aham mOkSa svarUpO-aham OmkAra
 gamyO-aham sUkSmO-aham sUkSmO-aham anadhO-aham adbhutAtmAham
   
caraNam 3

svaprakAshO-aham vibhuraham niSprAncO-aham apramEyO-aham 
acalO-aham akalO-aham niSpratakaryO khaNDaikarO-aham
   
caraNam 4

ajanirmamOham budhavana
